title: Heartseeker Varus
body:
Hello everyone, i would like to know if its possible to get the Heartseeker Varus skin, or if it will be available for purchase in further future, i am really into it, i need it haha 
xoxo{{champion:110}}

replies.body: He is a [legacy skin](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins), so there is a chance he will return to the store!  You'll want to keep an eye on our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page to see when that will happen.  You can also try your luck and find him in hextech chests or mystery gifts.  Good luck!
